<$set name=cur_title filter=<<currentCard>> >
<$list variable=missing_tag filter="[prefix<cur_title>!tag<cur_title>]">
<$link to=<<missing_tag>> /> missing tag
</$list><!--missing_tag-->

<$list variable=filter_text filter="[<cur_title>split[Draft of ']join[]split[']join[]]">
<$list variable=cur_card filter="[tag<filter_text>!match<cur_title>!suffix[/base-install]sort[]]">

<$link to=<<cur_card>> />
</$list><!--cur_card-->
</$list><!--filter_text-->
</$set><!--cur_title-->
title: $:/positivesigner/gcmpr

text:
\define gcmpr_compare_card(ur_ttb_card) <$list variable=ttb_card filter="[[$ur_ttb_card$]!match[]]"> <$list variable=compare_card filter="[addprefix[$:/state/popup/compare-card/]]"> <$link to=<> /> <> <>
<$link to=<> /> <> <> <$edit-text autoHeight=no tiddler=<> tag=textarea default="" /> <> \end \define gcmpr_ref_edit_source_text(ttb_card, compare_card) <$vars enr_text="text" > <$list variable=source_text filter="[getelse[]]"> <$button> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<> /> Copy Source \end \define gcmpr_ref_copy_over_ttb_card(ttb_card, compare_card) <$vars enr_text="text" > <$list variable=compare_text filter="[getelse[]]"> <$button> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<> /> Overwrite Source \end \define gcmpr_ref_replace_comment_endings(ttb_card, compare_card) <$button> <$vars comment_flag="--" lit_exclm="!" lit_lt="<" lit_gt=">" enr_text="text" > <$wikify name=lit_lf text=" "> <$list variable=comment_open_text filter="[addsuffixaddsuffix]"> <$list variable=comment_close_text filter="[addsuffix]"> <$list variable=comment_close_replace filter="[addsuffixaddsuffix]"> <$list variable=replace_text filter="[getsplitjoinaddprefixaddprefixaddsuffixaddsuffix]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<> /> Replace comment endings
\end \define gcmpr_ref_disp_diff_text() <$list variable=val_ttb_card filter="[get[text]!match[]]"> <$list variable=val_compare_card filter="[get[text]!match[]]"> <$diff-text source=<> dest=<> /> \end \define gcmpr_ref_disp_textedit_link() <$list variable=cur_url filter="[{$:/info/url/full}]"> <$list variable=new_link filter="[addsuffix[#]addsuffix[$:/positivesigner/gcmpr/textarea]split[$:]join[%24%3A]]"> > target="_blank" >text editor \end \define gcmpr_btn_cmp_current() <$list variable=cur_card filter="[all[current]]"> <$list variable=dest_card filter="[addprefix[$:/state/popup/gcmpr/]]"> <$vars lit_lt="<" lit_gt=">" lit_s=" " lit_qs='"' macro_name="gcmpr_compare_card" enr_text="text" > <$list variable=macro_call_text filter="[addsuffixaddsuffixaddsuffixaddsuffixaddsuffixaddsuffixaddsuffixaddsuffix]"> <$button class=<> > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<> /> <$action-navigate $to=<> /> Compare to Textbox \end \define gcmpr_textarea_new() <$vars enr_text="text" enr_new_filename="new_filename" enr_rows="rows" enr_cols="cols" enr_disp_btn_incr_decr="disp_btn_incr_decr" lit_state_popup_prefix="$:/state/popup/gcmpr_textarea/" lit_default_rows="20" lit_default_cols="160" cur_card=<> > <$list variable=temp_card filter="[addprefix]"> New file name: @@margin-left:5px; <$edit-text tiddler=<> field=new_filename placeholder="" autoHeight=yes tag=input/> @@ <$list variable=val_disp_btn_incr_decr filter="[get!match[]else[]]"> <$list variable=val_rows filter="[get!match[]!match[0]else]"> <$list variable=val_cols filter="[get!match[]!match[0]else]"> <$list variable=val_new_filename filter="[get!match[]]"> <$list variable=new_card filter="[addprefix]"> <$list variable=new_temp_card filter="[addprefix]"> <$list variable=filter_newcard_not_exists filter="[!is[tiddler]]"> <$button> <$list variable=cur_card_text filter="[get]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field=<> $value=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field=<> $value=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field=<> $value=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field=<> $value=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field=<> $value=<> /> <$action-navigate $to=<> /> New card
<$list variable=filter_disp_buttons filter="[!match[]]"> @@margin-right:20px; <$button> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field=<> $value="" /> Show Resize buttons @@ Rows: <> <$list variable=filter_disp_buttons filter="[match[]]"> <$button> <$list variable=val_new_rows filter="[add[10]]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field=<> $value=<> /> + <$list variable=filter_zero_rows filter="[!match[0]]"> <$button> <$list variable=val_new_rows filter="[subtract[10]]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field=<> $value=<> /> - Cols: <> <$list variable=filter_disp_buttons filter="[match[]]"> <$button> <$list variable=val_new_cols filter="[add[10]]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field=<> $value=<> /> + <$list variable=filter_zero_cols filter="[!match[0]]"> <$button> <$list variable=val_new_cols filter="[subtract[10]]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field=<> $value=<> /> - @@margin-left:20px; <$button> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field=<> $value="hide" /> Hide resize buttons @@
title: $:/positivesigner/gcmpr/mcr gcmpr_compare_card
